title: Unbounded Capacity Associative Memory for Real-valued Pattern Storage and Recall
abstract: We describe an unbounded capacity Associative Memory which effectively stores and retrieves unrestricted real-valued data/patterns with fidelity. This Associative Memory arises from a gradient system of a (differentiable scalar) energy function, and thus can directly be incorporated within existing layers of computational Deep Learning (DL) frameworks. The design effort also describes two options for key pattern retrieval.
venue: Midwest Symposium on Circuits and Systems

tldr.text: An unbounded capacity Associative Memory which effectively stores and retrieves unrestricted real-valued data/patterns with fidelity is described which can directly be incorporated within existing layers of computational Deep Learning frameworks.
